install.packages("tidycensus")
library(tidycensus)
census_api_key("fc2cacf0853a53a209ebf8f1a57f2cd8d1994d3a", install = FALSE)
install.packages("sf")
install.packages("dplyr")
install.packages("ggplot2")
library(ggplot2)
install.packages("readr")
Sys.getenv("CENSUS_API_KEY")

wi_income <- get_acs(
  geography = "tract",
  variables = c(medinc = "B19013_001", medage = "B17001_002"),
  state = "WI",
  county = "Dane",
  year = 2020, geometry = TRUE)

ggplot(data = wi_income) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = estimate), color = NA) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(
    option = "plasma",
    name = "Median Income ($)",
    na.value = "grey80"
  ) +
  labs(
    title = "🗺️ Median Household Income by Census Tract in Dane County, WI (2020)",
    subtitle = "Source: U.S. Census Bureau, ACS 5-Year Estimates",
    caption = "Note: Tracts with missing data shown in gray"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = "bold"),
    legend.title = element_text(size = 12),
    legend.text = element_text(size = 10)
  )
